Build I20021217

1. Start empty workspace
2. Window->Preferences->Workbench->Fonts
3. Select "Text Font"
4. Press Change...
5. Change the size to 12 and press OK to close the font dialog
6. Press Apply
==> NPE (see below)
Note: no NPE if OK is pressed instead of Apply
